name: ebook2audiobook
description: ebook2audiobook is a utility that converts eBooks into spoken audio using text-to-speech engines. It is aimed at users who prefer listening to long texts and automates the process from input files to audio output.
features: Text-to-Speech Conversion: Transform ebooks into spoken audio automatically. Listen instead of reading.
Multiple Formats: Support for various ebook file types. Universal compatibility.
Automated Processing: Batch convert entire libraries effortlessly. Save hours of manual work.
Quality Audio: Natural-sounding voice synthesis. Pleasant listening experience.
Accessibility: Make written content accessible to everyone. Inclusive reading solution.
Self-Hosted: Process your books privately. Complete control over conversions.
